titles.title: Klamath Basin Economic Disaster Relief Act of 2001

To respond to the economic disaster threatening certain farmers and communities resulting from the Federal Government's denial of irrigation water for the Klamath Irrigation Project in the States of Oregon and California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 8/2/2001--Introduced. Klamath Basin Economic Disaster Relief Act of 2001 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out an economic relief program in the States of Oregon and California to provide compensation for employment, crop, livestock, and land-value losses directly related to the denial of irrigation water for the Klamath Irrigation Project.
